response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, we understand its worth stands at $1,500,000. After careful consideration, we propose to sell this exceptional product to you for $1,400,000. This offer reflects our commitment to providing high-quality solutions while also ensuring a fair return for our investment. We believe this price offers an excellent opportunity for both parties to achieve their goals. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1400000}
